channel.title: API on Twilio API Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in API on Twilio API Explorer

item.title: Feedback
item.description: How to send and fetch messages with the Twilio Messaging API. PROVIDE FEEDABACK Send an SMS for which to provide feedback with ProvideFeedback=true param. console.log("POSTMAN PARAMS: ..\/..\/_includes\/feedback\/create.js", postmanParams) GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Headers Auth Path Params Query Params + + Request Response Status: − document .

item.title: Messages

item.title: Test Credentials
item.description: How to send messages with test credentials to simulate different responses. This API uses the test credentials and test phone numbers described here. SUCCESS console.log("POSTMAN PARAMS: ..\/..\/_includes\/test\/success.js", postmanParams) GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Headers Auth Path Params Query Params + + Request Response Status: − document .
